substats: CRIT Rate = CRIT DMG% > SPD (until breakpoint) > ATK%

conesNew.notes: Best Light Cone option for Argenti but not by as massive of a margin as some other characters Signature Cones.

Assumes 100% uptime on the Weakness Break buff (which won't happen often) and the ATK buff also is calculated as if you're attacking at least 3 targets all the time - so this Light Cone will perform worse on single target than others.
Second best Light Cone option for Argenti that is a bit weaker, but it buffs the whole of his kit instead of just the Ultimate.
A decent option due to the CRIT DMG and DMG% increases, but sadly Argenti can't use the Follow-Up part of it, so it's wasted on him.
A great ATK buff and conditional CRIT DMG (which won't be that hard to keep up if you use Argenti in AOE scenarios). A decent choice if you lack the Light Cones above.
Best free 2 play option for Argenti that it isn't performing much worse compared to other Light Cones.
50% uptime on the Weakness Break buff.
Since the majority of Argenti's damage comes from his Ultimate, this is a good option if you lack other Cones.
